name: Visual-Space
description:
A meta-horror game involving an app downloaded that allows you to explore space. But we all know programmes have a personality of their own....

WASD to move, other instructions can be found in the menu.

(some info...)

This is a very quick experiment into  using dll.imports/ servces in visual studios combined with the unity game engine...

facts about the moon!!!

https://theplanets.org/space-facts/

  • Europa is one of the four largest moons of Jupiter, its is also covered in ice so it would make for a great ice rink!!
  • Neptune’s winds are the fastest in the solar system, reaching 2,575 kilometers per hour (1,600 miles per hour)! 
  • 99 percent of our solar system's mass is the sun
  • Pluto has an atmosphere that consists of 20 layers!!
